name: Angular-projects
body: # Angular Repo where I can keep track of projects I have completed using AngularJS and the code that I have used. #### Projects 1. TV Guide 2. Pizza Planet 3. Workout Log 4. Gameboard 5. Feedster 6. Outbox 7. Top 10 ## TV Guide Movie review board using a controller, a view, and a custom directive. ## Pizza Planet Restaurant menu using filters and directives ## Workout Log Exercise tracking app using directives. ## Gameboard Custom directive that tracks the scores of games. ## Feedster News feed that uses custom directives ## Outbox Email app that maps URLs to views. ## Top 10 App fetches movie data from a server and displays it in a custom directive.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
